pageProduct.name: OGX Coconut Milk Conditioner 88.7ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

OGX Coconut Milk Conditioner helps add strength, elasticity, hydration, and balance for healthy hair. The sulfate free conditioner uses a luxurious hydrating blend of coconut milk, coconut oil and egg white proteins to soften and moisturise the hair.

OGX Nourishing+ Coconut Milk Conditioner.
Why You Want It... It's like a trip to the tropics in a bottle. The luxuriously creamy, hydrating conditioner blend helps leave your hair feeling moisturized, glowing, and super soft.

Indulge your senses with this exclusive blend with coconut milk, coconut oil, and ultra whipped egg white proteins. This exotic coconut conditioner formula helps add strength, elasticity, hydration, and balance for healthy hair.


  • Moisturising conditioner with coconut milk, coconut oil and egg white proteins

  • Sulfate free sufactants, (sodium lauryl sulfate) SLS free

  • Not tested on animals

Size: 88.7 ml

Shelf Life in Days: 1095 days

KEY FEATURES

• Travel Size
• Nourishing Conditioner
• Coconut Milk


Warnings

Warning: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs,
rinse immediately. In case of any discomfort, please discontinue and
consult a physician. Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Ingredients: Water, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Cocamidopropyl
Betaine, Glycol Distearate, Citric Acid, Fragrance, Laureth-4, Sodium
Benzoate, Sodium Citrate, Polyquaternium-22, Argania Spinosa Kernel
Oil, Linoleamidopropyl PG-Dimonium Chloride Phosphate, PEG-7
Amodimethicone, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer,
Polyquaternium-39, PEG-150 Pentaerythrityl Tetrastearate, PPG-2
Hydroxyethyl Cocamide, Sodium Hydroxide, CI 19140, CI 17200, Hexylene Glycol.

Directions

What You Do... Apply Shampoo generously to wet hair, massage into a
lather through to ends, then rinse the hair thoroughly. After shampooing,
follow with conditioner. For best results, use in conjunction with other
OGX products.
